LanguageData.HoMe.useCookingAppliances: Pawns will use unreserved cooking appliances (stoves etc.) to heat
LanguageData.HoMe.thawIt: Frozen things will be thawed by pawns before consuming
LanguageData.HoMe.negativeMoodEnabled: Enable negative moodlets from bad food temperature
LanguageData.HoMe.positiveMoodEnabled: Enable positive moodlets from good food temperature
LanguageData.HoMe.slowDiffuseWhileCarried: Carried items change temperature very slowly
LanguageData.HoMe.warmersSlowRotTT: Things being warmed in storage will rot more slowly (equivalent to refrigeration)
LanguageData.HoMe.multipleHeat: Multiple pawns can heat at same building
LanguageData.HoMe.multipleHeatTT: Pawns won't reserve buildings when they heat food, so multiple pawns will be able to use the same appliance to reheat meals. Default off.
